name: Artful Device Fragment
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  An intricate device once known as the "Seven Tools of the Great Thief." Rumorsclaim it was created by the legendary thief, Reed Miller.  Just as the first Treasure Hoarders came from all walks of life, thiscombination of tools meant for different purposes was designed to break downartificial boundaries, regardless of whether they were chains or borders.  It should be noted that there are more than seven tools, its just that peopleare accustomed to using seven to describe anything numerous. Perhaps it is forthe same reason that the world is believed to have only seven forms of order.
